title: Secrets of Pawnless Endings

references.title: A revised survey of six-man pawnless endings.
http://chess.jaet.org/endings/ Chess endgame-server and reference site.
http://cm.bell-labs.com/cm/cs/who/ken/chesseg.html. 6-man EGTs, maximal positions, maximal mutual zugzwangs and endgame statistics. 327: 1.

abstract: It is now 32 years since Ströhlein’s pioneering computation of KRKN and ten years since the publication of Nunn’s Secrets of Rook Endings. This book defined a new genre under his authorship and editorship (Nunn, 1992, 1994, 1995; Müller and Lamprecht, 1999, 2001) and has merited a second edition. Now comes the second edition of Secrets of Pawnless Endings
